text: The Wonder Man is a 1920 American silent drama film directed by John G. Adolfi and starring Georges Carpentier. ==Cast== * Georges Carpentier as Henri D'Alour * Faire Binney as Dorothy Stoner * Florence Billings as Mrs. Stoner * Downing Clarke as Mr. Stoner * Cecil Owen as Mr. Robbins * Robert Barrat as Alan Gardner * William Halligan as Bubbles * Pat Hartigan as Monroe * John Burkell as Butler ==See also== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1920 films Category:Films directed by John G. Adolfi Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1920 drama films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films
title: The Wonder Man (film)
